verses.roman:
śrī-haste dila sabāre eka eka mārjanī
saba-gaṇa lañā prabhu calilā āpani

synonyms: śrī-haste—by His own hand; dila—delivered; sabāre—unto every one of them; eka eka—one by one; mārjanī—a broom; saba-gaṇa—all the associates; lañā—taking; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; calilā—went; āpani—personally.
translation: He then gave each devotee a broom with His own hand, and taking all of them personally with Him, the Lord went to Guṇḍicā.
